t:type.name: AlexaPropertyReport
t:type.t:description: Represents the Alexa V3 capability structure returned in the endpoint structure

t:attribute.name: namespace
t:attribute.description: The Alexa Namespace of the property

t:attribute.name: name
t:attribute.description: The Alexa name of the property

t:attribute.name: value
t:attribute.description: The value of the property, the type of which depends on the property.

t:attribute.name: timeOfSample
t:attribute.description: The timestamp that the property value was sampled.

t:attribute.name: uncertaintyInMilliseconds
t:attribute.description: The uncertainty in the sampling (polling) in milliseconds.
